Articles.Content:
Hey guys, been playing KSP 1.0 for some time now and I started building a Mun Base - but all of a sudden, I can't add new modules because the docking nodes refuse to work! There is no magnetic pull and even if they are (visually) perfectly aligned, the module won't dock!

Is this a know bug? Did I break something?

I am running the latest version with the following mods:

Chatterer 

PlanetShine

Kerbal Engineer

Infernal Robotics

Can anyone help? ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Same thing happen to me after i took a picture with F12. now none of my nodes will work. after i just undocked.

Is where a workarround or something for this problem? In my save, this happened to a craft full of tourists, which is stuck in orbit. I want to rescue them, but the docking port on that thing is not working. Tried to dock to it with multiple crafts, but they wonÃ‚Â´t dock.

I only have MechJep installed (no MJ parts though...), but i tried this in a stock install and still not working

You could try doing a spacewalk using KAS to remove the dodgy port and re-add them. 

Also you did use the same size ports right? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
